EditActions1.label: Save / Discard
EditActions1.onSave: {{Update_Employee.run(() => showAlert('Edited employee ' + Employee_In_Store_Table.selectedRow.employee_id,'success'), () => showAlert('Must select row to edit','error'))}}

children.onClick: {{Fire_Employee_From_Store.run(() => showAlert('Successfully fired employee!','success'), () => showAlert('Error firing employee','error'))}}
